summary: Executive profile: My goal is to use my unique collection of expertise, experience, and skills gained from my seventeen years as a construction business development and marketing representative, five years managing a sales force, six years helping my father run his historic home remodeling business, and my college education to reach my full potential as an account executive by helping Visio Financial Services achieve steady, long-term, sustainable growth by building productive relationships with customers, co-workers, company leadership, and other stakeholders.

experience.title: Director of Business Development
experience.description: Led growth initiatives across multiple challenging markets, expanding market share in numerous cities including Miami, Minneapolis, Austin, Dallas, Denver, and more. Recovered declines, redesigned development programs, improved meeting formats to boost attendance and engagement, and delivered strategic plans leading to significant market share gains.

experience.title: Director of Business Development/Political Relations Director
experience.description: Directed business development across North Carolina, South Carolina and Georgia, expanded market share by 90% in the three states and over 100% in Atlanta, and served as political director enabling partnerships with corporate and end-user stakeholders, attending shareholder meetings and building high-level relationships.

experience.title: Business Manager/Account Executive
experience.description: Worked as an apprentice before taking on sales and management roles in auto services and B2B collections; built experience in sales, leadership, and customer service across multiple ventures.
